name: The Frog and it's Revenge on Halloween
name_original: The Frog and it's Revenge on Halloween
description:
Happy Halloween ! (a little late...)

With P'ch ANIME (facebook), we challenged ourselves with a Game Jam like Challenge : creating a video game in 2 days (30/10/2020 to 31/10/2020) !

It looks a lot like Flash games we used to find all over the Web (RIP Flash).

It still misses a lot of things (UX, Design, animations...) that could have been added/ fleshed out with an additional day of work but we did it for fun.

Tell us if you want us to do another one for Christmas, with three days of development this time !
